text: Empriini is a tribe of sawflies in the family Tenthredinidae. ;Genera include; * Ametastegia Costa 1882 * Aphilodyctium Ashmead 1898 * Empria Lepeletier & Serville 1828 * Monsoma MacGillivray 1908 * Monostegia Costa 1859 * Phrontosoma MacGillivray 1908 == References == == Bibliography == * * , in Category:Tenthredinidae Category:Hymenoptera tribes
title: Empriini
